name: Conquist Lite
description:
Conquist Lite transforms your IPad into the ultimate war strategy game board. Up to two simultaneous players (+ 1 bot) can enjoy this game with a single IPad. Risk it all for world domination!

Highlights:
★ World Domination mode.
★ Challenging AI players.
★ Use the IPad as a board, no need to pass it around. Just put your IPad on the table and start having fun.
★ Up to two simultaneous players (+ 1 bot).

FEATURES AVAILABLE IN CONQUIST FULL VERSION:
★ Super exciting SECRET MISSION mode.
★ Super fast TURBO mode.
★ Save up to TEN games.
★ Up to SIX simultaneous players.
★ Configurable game OPTIONS.
★ Easy, Medium and Extra Hard bots.

Customer reviews for the full version:

Board games - ★★★★★
One of the best strategy board games for the iPad by far. Amazingly polished and beautifully designed. Perfect for playing with friends or to play by yourself with AIs.

Beautiful - ★★★★★
I never liked Risk-style games, but this game changed that. It looks brilliant and works brilliant.

Good Risk clone - ★★★★★
Nicely done Risk clone. Streamlined interface makes playing alone or with friends an enjoyable experience.
